title: Seared tuna with pak choi
ingredients: ['For the pak choi', '2 teaspoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 to 2 pak choi, sliced', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', 'juice of 1/2 to 1 fresh lime', '2 teaspoons soya sauce', '4 teaspoons chicken stock', 'For the tuna', '2 teaspoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 (170g/6oz) fresh tuna steaks', 'lime juice, to taste', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste']
